content: मारः [मृ-घञ्] {@--1@} Killing, slaughter, slaying; अशेषप्राणिनामासीदमारो दश वत्सरान् <ls>Rāj. T. 5. 64.</ls> {@--2@} An obstacle, hinderance, opposition. {@--3@} The god of love; श्यामात्मा कुटिलः करोतु कब रीभारोपि मारोद्यमं <ls>Gīt. 3</ls>; (where मार primarily means ‘killing’); <ls>Nāg. 1. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Love, passion. {@--5@} The thorn-apple (धत्तूर). {@--6@} An evil one, a destroyer; (according to Buddhists). {@--7@} Death.
